description: This recipe makes the perfect morning or afternoon tea with a cup of tea or coffee or as a dessert with cream or ice cream.
name: Italian Apple Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake the cake for 45 minutes, or until the top is golden brown. Let it cool on a rack for 10 minutes, then remove the ring from around the cake. Let the cake cool another 20  30 minutes. Just before serving, dust the cake lightly with the icing sugar. Serve the cake warm or cooled, you can add ice cream or whipped cream if you're feeling indulgent Torta di mele, enjoy
